summary_comment: Chai Laoshi is highly regarded for her clear, professional, and attentive teaching style, which focuses on student growth and development. She provides consistent, helpful feedback and is known for her dedication to the subject matter. Students appreciate her extra support both in and outside of class, as well as her ability to inspire creative thinking in lesson planning.

Ratings.comment: Chai Laoshi is a fabulous Chinese teacher, assuming you like your language teachers to be clear, fair, attentive, firm, and extremely professional. No boundary issues and no surprises with Chai Laoshi. She has well-thought out, well-planned lessons, and she obviously cares a lot about student growth.

Ms. Chai was a very helpful instructor. She was friendly and passionate about Chinese pedagogy. She gave concrete feedback on students' performance. She was also willing to give assistance outside of class.

Ms. Chai is an excellent Chinese Teaching educator. She always demonstrates clear teaching models to students. Her feedback to students written and oral gives students a push, and she spends extra time assisting student teachers when needed. She led and inspired us to design lesson plans creatively through guidance. It was great learning under her.
